summary: RAM 1500 HEMI, WITH 1900 MILES ON IT, IT BROKE A VALVE SPRING, CRACKED THE BLOCK, LOST THE MOTOR. IT TOOK 14 DAYS TO GET THE MOTOR REPLACED, NOW IT HAS A REAR MAIN SEAL LEAK. WAITING ON PARTS, 12 DAYS. MY TRUCK HAS BEEN IT SHOP FOR 26 DAYS, I'VE ONLY OWNED IT FOR TWO AND HALF MONTHS. AFTER 30 DAYS IT FALLS UNDER THE LEMON LAW.   *NLM
